review: It's a great product. It provides easy access to a wide array of content. The two enhancements I hope to see some day are the ability to content surf, which may be hard to do, and the ability to search across content (software) providers.. Also unlike subscriptions like Showtime, which has far too much men-who-hate-women (MWHW) content, you can avoid MWHW content far more easily. I like some of the original content. I look forward to more female-friendly content, but unfortunately Hollywood is about 40-50 years behind the rest of America when it comes to sexism, and the MWHW content proves that Hollywood views sexism as a right of free speech in spite of the laws against it.
